alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:27AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT HARRISON...SOUTH CENTRAL FLOYD...NORTH CENTRAL MEADE...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN BULLITT COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM EDT... At 227 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Corydon, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Shively, Corydon, Valley Station, Pleasure Ridge Park, St. Dennis, Fairdale, Lanesville and Elizabeth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
